Literature.Title: Antimicrobial peptide therapeutics for cystic fibrosis.
Literature.Author: Zhang L, Parente J, Harris SM, Woods DE, Hancock RE, Falla TJ

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human fibroblasts WI-38:LD50=55 µg/ml,Human erythrocytes:50% Hemolysis=10 µg/ml
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli UB1005(MIC=4µg/ml),Salmonella enterica serovar Typhimurium(MIC=8µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa PAO1(MIC=8µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa M76(MIC=32µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa M917(MIC=128µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa M1251(MIC=16µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa M1426(MIC=16µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa R70(MIC=16µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus(MIC=8µg/ml),Candida albicans(MIC=64µg/ml),Pseudomonas stutzeri(MIC=2µg/ml),Pseudomonas fluorescens(MIC=8µg/ml),Ralstonia pickettii(MIC=4µg/ml),Stenotrophomonas maltophilia(MIC=4µg/ml),Achromobacter xylosoxidans(MIC=32µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MBC=>80µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MBC=30µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MBC=>40µg/ml),Candida albicans ATCC 10231(MFC=>50µg/ml),Human breast adenocarcinoma MCF-7(LD50=26µg/ml),Human colon adenocarcinoma SW480(LD50=38µg/ml),Human melanoma BMKC(LD50=85µg/ml),Human lung carcinoma H1299(LD50=72µg/ml),Human cervical carcinoma HeLa S3(LD50=145µg/ml),Human prostate adenocarcinoma PC-3(LD50=38µg/ml)
